author: cnbc.com
title: Graham Holdings Company Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
text:
ARLINGTON, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Graham Holdings Company (NYSE: GHC) today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.33 per share, payable on August 8, 2018, to shareholders of record on July 19, 2018.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180503006467/en/
